name: Popover
description: A non-modal popover component with anchor positioning and dismissable behavior

accessibility.screenReader: Trigger announces expanded state. Content is accessible when open.
knownLimitations: No focus trap - Tab exits popover

recommendedUsage: Use for supplementary content or actions triggered by a button. Content should be non-essential.
antiPatterns: Do not use for critical actions - use Dialog instead. Do not nest popovers.
